input.sentences: the place we stayed last year was beautiful .
i wanted to stay there forever .
output.sentences: Island Sha is very beautiful at this time of year
It is the number one destination for honey mooers seeking a private get away
There are mansions  nestled in between the tall trees and a ray of wild life on the Island.
It truly is a lovely place, most guest return at some point
Today it looks like a storm is coming. lets hope it does not do too much damage to Island Sha
